title: ​Official "Star Wars" poster released
text: 'Star Wars' Tickets Go on Sale After Trailer Debut on Monday Night Football 00:42 Not all Star Wars fans will have to wait in line for tickets. Lucasfilm announced on Sunday that advanced ticket sales and a new trailer for the J.J. Abrams-directed film, Star Wars: The Force Awakens, would arrive on Monday.
